title: "Algae is life: A greener future awaits."
description: Felipe Caldera since an early age has been interested in how the world works and the science behind every living thing. As many young millennials, he is concerned about the planet we occupy. Through his high school years he has decided to follow the path of biological engineering, in which he found his passion to research algal biofuels, which he has been growing under the stairs since last November.
author: Felipe Caldera, Mario Sanchez
